response.overview: The young Yang Erlang made a great contribution to the killing of the three-headed Jiao, and finally made an exception to be selected as the coveted Monster Hunter. He was thinking of finally reuniting with his mother through destroying demons and cultivating immortals, but he met the monkey who called himself the Monkey King. The two did not fight or knew each other, and they experienced various ups and downs along the way. Yang Erlang was awarded the title of Erlang God, and Monkey also became a Monkey King with boundless mana. And fate also made Erlangshen and Sun Wukong go from the friendship they knew in Wei Shi to the step of a confrontation.
response.title: Erlang God: Peerless God of War
